servinfo.title: Planetary Gears and Output Shaft Inspection

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Planetary Gears and Output Shaft Disassembly and Assembly:4 A/T

item.ptxt: Check that sliding surface of discs and plate are not worn or burnt. If necessary, replace them.
If disc lining is exfoliated, discolored or worn hardly, replace all discs.
If only a part of printed numbers is corroded, replace all discs.
Before assembling new discs, soak them in A/T fluid for at least 2 hours.
Measure inside diameter of output shaft bushing. If inside diameter exceeds limit, replace output shaft.

spec.title: Output shaft bushing inside diameter standard
